title: New Vendor Risk Assessment
description: A GRC analyst must conduct a security risk assessment of a new SaaS vendor that will handle sensitive customer data.

tasks.description: Send the standard vendor security questionnaire to the new vendor.
Review the vendor's responses and their supporting documentation (e.g., SOC 2 report).
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst analyzes the vendor's security posture based on their documentation.

tasks.description: Identify a potential risk related to the vendor's data breach notification policy and create a risk mitigation plan requiring contractual changes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst identifies a key risk and proposes a concrete plan to mitigate it.
